title: Breaking: Beyonce Cancels Upcoming Coachella Performance | Letty B | KISS 95.7
text:
â€” billboard (@billboard) February 23, 2017 
Source: Twitter 
This is the news we were hoping we wouldn't hear. Beyonce is officially not going to be performing at Coachella. She was scheduled to headline the festival this year, but instead will headline next year 2018. 
Doctors have ordered Queen Bey to keep a less rigorous schedule in the upcoming months, as she is pregnant with twins. The Beyhive is sad, but we are happy she is going to let her body rest!
